channel.title: Enable Always Run & HEV Enviromental Warnings
channel.description:
First I'd like to say great job on the game, really enjoying the massively updated steam version of the game.
Secondly I'd like to bring up some bugs.
1. Unchecking "Enable Always Run" seems to have no effect, shouldn't it make Gordon run be default and walk when holding down sprint like in HL1? 2. The HEV HUD shows environmental damage incorrectly. [url=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/46003529/2015-05-06_00266.jpg]Cold shows as Fire[/url], and [url=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/46003529/2015-05-06_00323.jpg]Fire as nothing[/url].
Those are the two unique bugs I've noticed, congrats on the latest patch and hope these get fixed soon.

  1. Unchecking “Enable Always Run” seems to have no effect, shouldn’t it make Gordon run be default and walk when holding down sprint like in HL1?

Those are the two unique bugs I’ve noticed, congrats on the latest patch and hope these get fixed soon.
